Name: Magpul MOE AR-15 pistol grip (FDE)
Description: Polymer Magpul MOE (Magpul Original Equipment) pistol grip can be installed on any weapon compatible with AR-15 pistol grips. Thanks to the ergonomic shape and anti-slip texture, it makes weapon grip and control more comfortable. Inside of the grip contains free space for spare parts, tools and accessories kit or batteries.
